message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but $60 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $90 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $70 for the product. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your efforts to find a price we both agree on.  I can go down to $85, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable paying $85. I'm willing to pay $80, which is the price I was initially considering when I saw the product. Can you meet me at this price?
